ClassDef.Name: Player

Properties.Name: UserID
Properties.Description: The unique ID of the player.

Properties.Name: CanMove
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player can move.

Properties.Name: SprintSpeed
Properties.Description: Determines the sprinting speed of the player.

Properties.Name: Stamina
Properties.Description: Determines the current stamina of the player.

Properties.Name: MaxStamina
Properties.Description: Determines the maximum stamina of the player.

Properties.Name: UseStamina
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player uses stamina.

Properties.Name: StaminaRegen
Properties.Description: Determines the rate at which the player's stamina regenerates.

Properties.Name: StaminaBurn
Properties.Description: Determines the rate at which the player's stamina depletes while sprinting.

Properties.Name: RespawnTime
Properties.Description: Determines the time the player has to wait before respawning.

Properties.Name: UseHeadTurning
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player uses head turning.

Properties.Name: UseBubbleChat
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player uses bubble chat.

Properties.Name: AutoLoadAppearance
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player's appearance is automatically loaded.

Properties.Name: NetworkPing
Properties.Description: The amount of network latency (ping) the player is experiencing.

Properties.Name: IsAdmin
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player is an administrator.

Properties.Name: IsCreator
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player is the creator of the game.

Properties.Name: ChatColor
Properties.Description: Determines the chat color of the player.

Properties.Name: IsLocal
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player is the local player.

Properties.Name: IsClimbing
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player is currently climbing.

Properties.Name: ClimbingTruss
Properties.Description: Determines the truss the player is currently climbing.

Properties.Name: UserPlatform
Properties.Description: Determines the platform the player is using.

Properties.Name: Inventory
Properties.Description: The inventory of the player.

Methods.Name: Kick
Methods.Description: Kicks the player from the game with the specified reason.

Methods.Name: UnequipTool
Methods.Description: Unequips the currently equipped tool of the player.

Methods.Name: ResetAppearance
Methods.Description: Resets the player's appearance to the default.

Events.Name: Respawned
Events.Description: Fires when this player has respawned

ClassDef.Description: Player represents a user playing the game.
